columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the application.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The display name of the application.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

columns.name: last_modified_date
columns.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 format, when the application's settings were last modified.

columns.name: campaign_hook
columns.description: The settings for the AWS Lambda function to invoke by default as a code hook for campaigns in the application.

columns.name: limits
columns.description: The default sending limits for campaigns in the application.

columns.name: quiet_time
columns.description: The default quiet time for campaigns in the application.
